Nyles.action: Expresses a deep emotional exhaustion by saying, 'I've felt everything I'll ever feel so I'll never feel ever again.'

Nyles.action: Sulked at the bar, dropped his face down on the bar, and expressed a deep emotional resignation ('I've felt everything I'll ever feel so I'll never feel ever again').

Nyles.action: Reflects deeply on his past with Sarah, showing emotional insight and self-awareness.

Nyles.action: Quickly pieces together a haphazard plan after being confronted.

Nyles.action: Defiantly shoots his whiskey and shatters the glass with a glare.

Nyles.action: Uses humor and meta-commentary (e.g., naming punctuation marks) during a serious moment.

Nyles.action: Locks eyes with Sarah and lets his declaration linger, showing confidence and emotional presence.
